price: Hakika mimi nimemuamini Mola wenu Mlezi, basi nisikilizeni!
footnotes: Hakika mimi ninamsadiki Mola wenu Mlezi aliye kuumbeni, na ndiye Mwenye kutawala mambo yenu. Basi nisikilezeni na mnit'ii.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
